name: Roll-Chan 6
overview:
In the year 20XX, the first Robot Tournament is held with the most powerful robots coming from different countries participating in the event. However, Mr.X, the sponsor of the tournament took over them and used their powers to subdue the world. (Sounds familiar, huh?)

With Mr.X revealing himself as a new despot controlling 8 powerful battle-type Robot Masters, Roll-chan is once again needed to save the world. To go toe-to-toe with the more powerful enemies, Tango is modified to combine with Roll as powerful armor adapters that will enhance her abilities and firepower, but before they knew it, these were stolen by Mr.Xs minions.

Before she could take control of the new adapter, Roll must confront the Robot Masters head on with her own power.

Join Roll on her sixth adventure! Defeat Mr.X and save the world!
